partitions.name: Dim_PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_PURCHASE_ORDER_RECEIPT
partitions.expression:
let
                Source = Sql.Database("REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_SERVER", "REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_DATABASE"),
                Query = Value.NativeQuery(
                    Source,
                    "SELECT DISTINCT [PO_NUMBER], [SITE_NUMBER], [RELEASE_NUMBER], [PO_LINE_NUMBER], ISNULL(CAST([PO_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([SITE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([RELEASE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([PO_LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') as [PO_LINE_NUMBER_PO_NUMBER_RELEASE_NUMBER_SITE_NUMBER_Key] FROM (SELECT [PO_NUMBER], [SITE_NUMBER], [RELEASE_NUMBER], [PO_LINE_NUMBER] FROM [PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE] UNION ALL SELECT [PO_NUMBER], [SITE_NUMBER], [RELEASE_NUMBER], [PO_LINE_NUMBER] FROM [PURCHASE_ORDER_RECEIPT]) AS CombinedKeys WHERE ISNULL(CAST([PO_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([SITE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([RELEASE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([PO_LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') IS NOT NULL AND ISNULL(CAST([PO_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([SITE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([RELEASE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([PO_LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') <> ''''''",
                    null, 
                    [EnableFolding = true]
                )
                in
                Query
